papers.title: Intense Highly Charged Heavy Ion Beam Production
authors: With increase of applications of heavy ions in the various fields
production of intense beam of highly charged heavy ions form the ion sources become more and more important. For example

ion sources are required to produce intense dc beams of the highly charged heavy ions for the accelerator facilities of radio isotope beam production and the intense short pulsed beams for injection into synchrotrons. Additionally
the ion sources face several important matters to be improved for meeting the requirements
and beam emittance. For these purposes
electron beam ion sources and laser ion sources
for production of the intense beam (dc and pulsed) of highly charged heavy ions have been constructed and achieved remarkable breakthrough in the past decade. In this contribution
state-of-the-art ion sources for production of intense highly charged heavy ion beams are reviewed. Future perspective is also discussed.
